item.title: How to use the draw back arrow gfx?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

I know, it did for me also, on my old source but not this one I guess, but I did do the coding a little different…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

item.title: How to use the draw back arrow gfx?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

If I have the id for the arrow draw back how do I add it to the bow? The ice arrow draw back gfx id is 25 so how would I add it to the crystal bow?

Like this?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) //Cyrstal bow { createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 70, 249, 43, 43, 0 - AttackingOn); stillgfx = ??? PkingDelay = 8; wepdelay = 8; UseBow = true; }

Isn’t the stillgfx man like it repeats, also, how do I add the gfx id?
